inclusion.criterion: approached for consent to participate in this study
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: randomized to one of three treatment arms: usual care, RV pacing (single ventricle pacing), or biventricular pacing
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Inability to give written informed consent
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has multifactorial chronic hypoxemia and dyspnea thought due to diastolic CHF, pulmonary hypertension thought secondary to a chronic ASD and COPD on 5L home oxygen. Patient tolerated an inpatient trial of sildenafil without hypotension.
